EXERCISE: Do regular aerobic exercise (running, walking, biking, hiking, etc.)
Do strength training several days per week
Do flexibility exercises several days per week
Play a sport at least once per week
Attend exercise classes and/or join a gym
SLEEP: Limit time spent looking at phone or computer screens in the two hours before I go to sleep
Use darkness at night and light in the morning to aid in syncing circadian rhythms
NUTRITION: Eat several servings of vegetables and fruits each day
Avoid or minimize sugary foods and drinks
Stay hydrated, drinking around 8-12 cups of water per day
STRESS REDUCTION: Do mental renewal activities (e.g., meditation, yoga, tai chi) every day
Spend an average of 2 hours each week in nature
Spend quality time with people who are important to me almost every day
Do 'morning pages' -- writing 3 pages of stream of consciousness each day
Give to others (e.g., compassion, support, attention, acts of kindness, gifts)
ROUTINES: Go to sleep and wake up at consistent times each day
Eat at consistent times each day
Engage in joyful, non-work, screen-free activities daily (reading a book, playing games, hobbies, sports, time with friends and family, etc.)
Spend 30 minutes or less a day using social media (instagram, tiktok, twitter, facebook, youtube, etc.)
Identify your most important priorities at the start of each day and reflect at the end of the day the extent to which you were able to attend to those priorities.
